columns.name: registry_id
columns.description: The AWS account ID associated with the registry that contains the repositories to be described.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the repository.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The date and time, in JavaScript date format, when the repository was created.

columns.name: image_tag_mutability
columns.description: The tag mutability setting for the repository.

columns.name: last_evaluated_at
columns.description: The time stamp of the last time that the lifecycle policy was run.

columns.name: max_results
columns.description: The maximum number of repository results returned by DescribeRepositories.

columns.name: encryption_configuration
columns.description: The encryption configuration for the repository.

columns.name: image_details
columns.description: A list of ImageDetail objects that contain data about the image.

columns.name: repository_scanning_configuration
columns.description: Gets the scanning configuration for one or more repositories.

columns.name: image_scanning_configuration
columns.description: The image scanning configuration for a repository.

columns.name: policy
columns.description: The JSON repository policy text associated with the repository.

columns.name: policy_std
columns.description: Contains the policy in a canonical form for easier searching.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the Repository.
